column2: Retirees and near-retirees often don’t know what they’re looking for when searching for a financial adviser. Consider the following radio ad pitches, each of which came from one of the biggest national advisory firms. There is no financial planning company in the country that couldn’t honestly embrace each of the following statements.
column4: The most crucial part of retirement financial planning

column2: Here's a hint about what might make it possible to have an IRA worth this much money: It helps to be in private equity.
